Sign-up Process

Joining BenFit Gym is simple and hassle-free.

01

Schedule a Tour

Come and explore our gym! Schedule a tour to see our state-of-the-art facilities

02

Fill Out the Form

Complete the membership sign-up form with your personal details and interests

03

Start Your Fitness Journey

Once your membership is activated, you can start attending classes, facilities
